column5: I need a feed of fresh smelt;s    WHERE AND WHEN   anyone one know of a place close to the big city. east or west even north  of the city .  thanks

Simcoe was always a sure bet,  but havent been in years.  Might be worth a trip up to IBP around 10pm to check and see,  think the water is still too cold tho...  Rumor has it the smelt population is way down  but not sure on that one...  Dan
well Ive been hearing the last few years the entrance to hamilton harbour has been producing really well
